table.name: vtiger_cbcompany
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbcompany` ( `cbcompanyid` int(11) NOT NULL, `companyname` varchar(100) default NULL, `cbcompanyno` varchar(100) default NULL, `comercialname` varchar(100) default NULL, `siccode` varchar(100) default NULL, `accid` int(11) default NULL, `phone` varchar(30) default NULL, `address` varchar(100) default NULL, `fax` varchar(30) default NULL, `city` varchar(100) default NULL, `email` varchar(50) default NULL, `state` varchar(100) default NULL, `website` varchar(255) default NULL, `postalcode` varchar(100) default NULL, `companybr` varchar(100) default NULL, `country` varchar(100) default NULL, `companylopd` varchar(100) default NULL, `defaultcompany` varchar(3) default NULL, `companylogo` text default NULL, `applogo` text default NULL, `favicon` text default NULL, index (`cbcompanyid`), index (`cbcompanyno`), index (`companyname`), PRIMARY KEY (`cbcompanyid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbcompanycf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbcompanycf` ( `cbcompanyid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbcompanyid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
